description: An MCP server giving access to Grafana dashboards, data and more.

environmentVariables.name: GRAFANA_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Service account token used to authenticate with your Grafana instance

environmentVariables.name: GRAFANA_USERNAME
environmentVariables.description: Username to authenticate with your Grafana instance

environmentVariables.name: GRAFANA_PASSWORD
environmentVariables.description: Password to authenticate with your Grafana instance
